nodes.text: On the planet Koba, a bridge was erected over a gorge and renamed to honor the fallen Jedi Master Polvin Kut, who had been killed a century before its reconstruction during a battle with the forces of the Advozse warlord Tulak. The native Koban people rebuilt the bridge and through it memorialized the Jedi Master, whose likeness was carved into the structure. The bridge was damaged when Tulak's son, Kalut attempted to reclaim the planet in the name of his father.
